suggest.amasty/module-affiliate-mftf-3: Install module-affiliate-mftf-3 module to be able to run Affiliate MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.1 and higher.
suggest.amasty/module-mixin-rewrite-patch: Install mixin rewrite patch if you have a problem with extension on Magento 2.4.2+ version on Checkout
suggest.amasty/module-affiliate-mftf-2: Install module-affiliate-mftf-2 module to be able to run Affiliate MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5 and higher.
